summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 5, 2019. It includes official count sheets, out-count forms, and inmate rosters detailing inmate locations and assignments. The records show inmate Jeffrey Epstein was assigned to unit Z04-206LAD for an attorney visit on that date.

events.title: Daily Prison Administrative Counts and Assignments
events.description: Routine administrative activities at the Metropolitan Correctional Center including inmate counts, out-counts for work assignments (Food Service, FNYS), attorney visits, and hospital assignments.

events.title: Epstein's Attorney Visit
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is recorded as being assigned to unit Z04-206LAD for an attorney (ATTY) visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 5, 2019, with register number 76318-054.
On August 5, 2019, Epstein was assigned to housing unit Z04-206LAD for an attorney (ATTY) visit.
The documents show routine prison administration, including out-counts for work assignments like Food Service (FS) and Federal New York South (FNYS), and hospital (HOSP) assignments.
Several inmate records, including those for Arias and Weber, are marked with 'SUICIDE OR', indicating suicide observation protocols.
The total inmate census for the facility on this date was recorded as 756 in one count and 734 in a verify count.
